0.title: AWS Lambda supports Kafka event sources in four new regions

12.title: AWS Lambda adds support for Ruby 3.3

14.title: Announcing availability of AWS Outposts in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia

15.title: Amazon DataZone announces integration with AWS Lake Formation hybrid mode

17.title: AWS Clean Rooms ML is now generally available

21.title: AWS Transfer Family offers predefined security policies for SFTP connectors
